00022 /* standard includes. */
00023 #include <stdio.h>

00027 #include <netinet/in.h>
00028 
00029 /* my includes. */
00030 #include "program_typedefs.h"
00031 
00032 /* function prototypes. */
00033 void log_report (FILE *, unique, unique);
00034 
00035 /* functions. */
00036 /* the following function prints an error. */
00037 void
00038 log_report (FILE * stream, unique msg, unique file)
00039 {
00040   /* is there any file for the report? */
00041   if (file != NULL)
00042     fprintf (stream, "%s error for `%s': %s.\n", msg, file, strerror (errno));
00043   else
00044     fprintf (stream, "%s error: %s.\n", msg, strerror (errno));
00045 }
